column2: core

column5:
The wiki is kind of unclear on whether
case are tracked with Engaged in a Case (eiac)
or Engaged in a Name-Making Case (nmc). So 
where I've found values for both I've used both
and ORed them.

column2: Making Your Name: A Name in Seven Secret Alphabets
Look for a Making Your Name storylet on Ladybones Road.
Pursue the Honey-Addled Detective on Moloch Street.
Look for a Making Your Name storylet on Ladybones Road.
Pursue the Tattooed Courier on Moloch Street.
Locate the Tattooed Courier at Mrs Plenty's Carnival.

The Honey-Addled Detective has a Making Your Name 
case for you on Moloch Street.
Pursue the Case of the Absconding Devil on Moloch Street.
Another case awaits within **Life on Ladybones Road**.
Pursue the Case of the Disappearing Heiress on Moloch Street.
Look for a Making Your Name storylet on Ladybones Road.
arch=503,cstones=506
Head to the Forgotten Quarter or Base-Camp. Learn the traditions.
column5: The quality that tracks if Base-Camp is visible is hidden.

column2:
Embark on expeditions from your Forgotten Quarter 
base-camp to increase Archaeologist.

Embark on an expedition to The Tomb of the Seven from your 
Forgotten Quarter base-camp.

Look for a Making Your Name storylet in your Forgotten Quarter
base-camp.
univtales=600
Head to The University
Look for Making Your Name storylets in The University.
You've completed the Watchful branch of Making Your Name!
Making Your Name: A Name Whispered in Darkness
myn=1016,muckraking=731
Look for a Making Your Name storylet in Spite.

Head to Spite and look for **Cat-catching!** or chat with 
The Careworn Journalist.

Head to Spite and look for **Cat-catching!** or storylets unlocked
my **Raking the Muck of the Neath**.

Engage in Area-Diving! If you haven't unlocked it, look for a
Making Your Name storylet in Spite.
column5:
This is another case where the qualities that
track if the player has pushed a button are hidden.

column2: Look for a Making Your Name storylet in The Flit.
Look to a Making Your Name storylet in The Flit for instructions.
heist=10065

There's a Making Your Name heist waiting for you. Find **Plan a Heist**
on the map or in **Preparing for a Big Score** in The Flit.

Prepare for and embark on your heist via **Preparing for a Big
Score** in The Flit.

Menace Eradication.

You must become a greater Procurer of Savage Beasts. 
**Hunt Dangerous Prey** in Wolfstack Docks. Prey can be found in:

- Watchmaker's Hill
- Spite
- The Flit
- Veilgarden
- Wolfstack Docks
Find Mr. Inch in The Labyrinth of Tigers
You've completed the Dangerous branch of Making Your Name!
